sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱灾害是湖南省最严重的自然灾害。

sentences.english: Drought and poor harvests led to a food crisis in Niger.
sentences.chinese: 尼日尔则因为旱灾和粮食歉收正面临粮食危机。

sentences.english: In this study, flood and drought losses of the system.
sentences.chinese: 本研究对水旱灾害损失进行了系统的研究。

sentences.english: Low temperatures and droughts reached their climax during Wang Mang's reign (9-23 CE).
sentences.chinese: 王莽时代低温和旱灾达到高峰。

sentences.english: The devastating 28 floods and droughts that imposed a recurrent tax of suffering on the fellah in no longer occur.
sentences.chinese: 过去给农民带来灾难的水旱灾害，现在也不再发生了。

sentences.english: The effect of drought on agriculture is frequent in Wandong area.
sentences.chinese: 皖东地区旱灾频繁发生，制约农业发展。

sentences.english: Not much further north, though, a drought was threatening the land.
sentences.chinese: 然而再往北去不远，一场旱灾正威胁着大地。

sentences.english: The great lakes along The Yangtze are also victims of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 长江流域五大湖也遭受旱灾的影响。

sentences.english: Firstly, to further improve ability to resist flood and drought disasters.
sentences.chinese: 第一，进一步提高抵御水旱灾害的能力。

sentences.english: China is battling weather extremes, including drought and floods.
sentences.chinese: 中国正与极端天气作战，包括旱灾和洪灾。

sentences.english: The flood and drought disaster is serious in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我国是一个水旱灾害异常严重的国家。

sentences.english: The drought and crop failure were the most serious in North China in a hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 那几年，华北平原发生了百年不遇的大旱灾和歉收。

sentences.english: The devastating floods and droughts that imposed a recurrent tax of suffering on the fellah in no longer occur.
sentences.chinese: 过去给农民带来灾难的水旱灾害，现在也不再发生了。

sentences.english: Lingxian County, in the eastern part of Shandong Province, suffered from heavy drought this spring.
sentences.chinese: 山东东部的陵县今年春天遭受了严重的旱灾。

sentences.english: Rising temperatures and more frequent droughts and floods can compromise food security.
sentences.chinese: 气温升高以及更频繁的旱灾和水灾可影响粮食保障。

sentences.english: It's really a miracle that their crops have survived the drought.
sentences.chinese: 这次旱灾没吧他们的庄稼干死真是奇迹。

definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
